name: Michael the Ant Thumper
description:
Overview

Michael is a super rich, super strong CEO.

One day his factory is overrun by ants! He really doesn't like ants but he does really like thumping ants with his punching glove Thumpers!

Help Michael save the day and his factory!

Michael the Ant Thumper is a Game Boy Color game that runs on real Game Boy hardware! There are four endings to the story, can you unlock them all?!

The game takes about 30 minutes to beat.

Controls
Game Boy
KeyboardMovementD-padArrows/WASDInteractAZThumpBXPauseStartEnter

  • My brother, Riley, for playtesting and being a hype man
